review.title: “Best job in the world!”
review.pros: Pros – We help people become healthier and able to lead more fulfilling lives as they understand what health is all about.
review.cons: Cons – It takes a lot of education and retraining to effectively be able to accomplish our goal stated above. Have to be able to take rejection and move on.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Keep doing what you are doing!
